@tehbus My father had only one kidney, no spleen I cant believe how selfish these people are. I feel your pain. Stay safe.

@tehbus Theyve said we can go to stores so if you are able to travel take the right procautions and shop as you would if youre not in the isolating groups which the vast majority of us shouldnt be. Just do one big shop.

Im so confused Im sat at home at as Im fortunate to be able to work from home and there has been a steady movement of people in and out of my estate in their cars all morning.... what are people not f*cking getting about lock down.... it cant all be full of key workers!
